name: Chef Hat
description: White and tall Cook's Hat which proves the identity of a cook. Every dedicated cook sees it as part of their body not for its function but for its implication.

name: Chef's Eagle Eye
description: The God of Hunting Ullr is worshipped by numerous mortals. In the past, People always had to worry about their next meal. A family would have to spend the whole year in famine if rainstorm or draught struck. In the long snow season, They had to risk their lives going out hunting. But Ullr taught people how to hunt, and tasty meat became more frequently seen on dining tables. (Use it to gain 40 stacks of Eagle Eye. There is a chance to gain food ingredient for each stack consumed. Note that not all monsters drop food ingredients. )

name: Chemical Protection Gloves
description: Gloves made of skins shed by seven kinds of venomous snakes that provide protection against almost any corrosive substance. The only drawback is their stuffiness.
effect: M.Def ＋10,For Refining ＋8, Atk ＋3%; For Refining ＋12, Ignore Def ＋5%
